name: LLEP City Builder
description:
This is a city builder prototype made during the Kenney Game Jam and the theme of this jam was growth, it's up to you to increase the number of Peons as much as possible!

How to play ?
  • Point and click !
  • Select a building to the left and place it on the map. Builds cost ressources !
  • Deselect a building to construct by clicking on it again
  • Select a tile / building while no builds selected to see more informations
  • You have to assign Peons to building in order to generate ressources.
  • Build houses to get more Peons to get more ressources to build more houses !
Notable Features
  • Basic system to control the population
  • Resources system to collect : wheats, woods and stones
  • Buildings to collect each resources (and also to increase your population of peon) : house, farm, sawmill, mine
  • Low poly 3d model based on asset proposed by the creator of this jam (thank you!)
  • Basic UI to control spawn of buildings and display further information on it and to assigned each peon
